title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Apr 06 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Apr 06 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


Undocumented guest host Mark Steyn fills in for Rush on Monday. An unprecedented time, only China isn’t tanking its economy. It’s nice to not have to hear about triggering or pronouns. The WHO’s Beijing Bob has yet to be removed. No direct deposit, no $1200 check until August. Why didn’t the surveillance state know China was lying? They can COVID test animals but not people. Boris Johnson goes to hospital with coronavirus. MyPillow CEO retools his business while Joy Behar does nothing. Without Trump, we’d be worse off in this crisis.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:


You can’t mortgage the future of human life to Dr. Fauci. Behavior is the difference in spreading infection. New York state’s COVID response is releasing prisoners into the community. When will the people get this stimulus check? Liberal nonsense: Trump wants to sign every check personally. The inconsistencies of the coronavirus metrics. Venezuelan Navy ship sinks trying to capture a cruise ship. Self-sustaining economies need to make things within their borders. Trump administration seeks legal action against China.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


We traded liberty for security. COVID fraud: Millions of masks never arrived to hospitals. A second coronavirus outbreak would be less of a problem. What is an underlying condition? The world economy faces an unprecedented time. Pelosi and Schiff plan to re-impeach the president. The war profiteering of Nancy Pelosi. We believed the WHO’s Chinese lies about human-to-human contact. Trump ran against the very problems this crisis reveals. Out-of-towners resentment. Who is the government to say what is and is not essential?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
